front.title: A Uniform Resource Name Namespace for the Device Identity and the Mobile Equipment Identity (MEID)

abstract.t: The specification fulfills the requirement from Third Generation Partnership Project 2 (3GPP2) by registering a Uniform Resource Name (URN) namespace for the device identity and a sub namespace for the Mobile Equipment Identity (MEID). The structure of the MEID is 15 hexadecimal encoded digits long and is defined in 3GPP2 to uniquely identify a mobile equipment.
